headline.main: MORE WARSHIPS OF BRITAIN HERE; 3 Battleships and 9 Other Vessels Have Visited Ports for Repairs or Servicing ABOUT 12 MORE IN YARDS New Rule Revised Earlier One Asking Voluntary Censorship Over Marine Movements

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Sept. 22 -- Three British battleships and nine other vessels were revealed by the Navy Department today as having visited American ports and departed after being repaired or serviced.
snippet: WASHINGTON, Sept. 22 -- Three British battleships and nine other vessels were revealed by the Navy Department today as having visited American ports and departed after being repaired or serviced....

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES
